# omit-empty [![NPM version](https://badge.fury.io/js/omit-empty.svg)](http://badge.fury.io/js/omit-empty)  [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jonschlinkert/omit-empty.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/jonschlinkert/omit-empty) 

> Recursively omit empty properties from an object. Omits empty objects, arrays, strings or zero.

## Install with [npm](npmjs.org)

```bash
npm i omit-empty --save
```

## Running tests
Install dev dependencies.

```bash
npm i -d && npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var omitEmpty = require('omit-empty');

omitEmpty({a: 'a', b: ''});
//=> {a: 'a'}

omitEmpty({a: 'a', b: {c: 'c', d: ''});
//=> {a: 'a', b: {c: 'c'}

omitEmpty({a: ['a'], b: []});
//=> {a: ['a']}

omitEmpty({a: 0, b: 1});
//=> {a: 0, b: 1}

// set the `noZero` flag
omitEmpty({a: 0, b: 1}, true);
//=> {b: 1}
```
